text: Shawn Mendes kicked off his career by opening for Taylor Swift ’ s 1989 World Tour in 2015 and now, with multiple hit songs and two studio albums behind him, he ’ s opening up about his rise to fame — and the best advice Swift gave him. ` ` She told me not to be afraid to go out on stage,'' Mendes told VMAN magazine's issue 38. “ Because everyone in the stadium came to have fun. This is not a judging contest, this is a concert.''
